name: Classic Pancakes
instructions: Mix flour, baking powder, and sugar in a large bowl.
Make a well in the center and add milk, egg, and melted butter.
Whisk until smooth (a few lumps are okay).
Heat a griddle over medium heat and lightly grease.
Pour 1/4 cup batter per pancake onto the griddle.
Cook until bubbles form on surface, then flip and cook until golden.

name: Simple Tomato Pasta
instructions: Cook pasta according to package directions. Reserve 1 cup pasta water.
Heat olive oil in a large pan over medium heat.
Add garlic and cook for 30 seconds until fragrant.
Add crushed tomatoes, salt, and pepper. Simmer for 15 minutes.
Drain pasta and add to the sauce. Toss to combine.
Add pasta water as needed to loosen the sauce.
Top with fresh basil and serve.

name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Mix flour, baking soda, and salt in a bowl. Set aside.
Beat butter and sugars until creamy.
Add eggs and vanilla to butter mixture. Beat well.
Gradually blend in flour mixture.
Stir in chocolate chips.
Drop rounded tablespoons onto ungreased baking sheets.
Bake for 9-11 minutes or until golden brown.
Cool on baking sheet for 2 minutes, then transfer to wire rack.
